tasks.label: web-dev-env
tasks.command: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && docker compose --profile web-dev up -d && sleep 5 && turbo dev

tasks.label: clean-web-dev-env
tasks.command: docker compose down -v --remove-orphans && rm -rf volumes && docker compose --profile web-dev up -d && sleep 5 && turbo dev
